concepts.name: NewJeans
concepts.description: A South Korean girl group formed by ADOR, a subsidiary of Hybe Labels, known for their unique blend of genres and unconventional debut process.

concepts.name: ADOR
concepts.description: A subsidiary of Hybe Labels that formed NewJeans, marking a new direction in K-pop group formation and debut processes.

concepts.name: Hybe Labels
concepts.description: The parent company of ADOR, a major player in the K-pop industry, known for groups like BTS and Seventeen.

concepts.name: Unconventional Debut
concepts.description: NewJeans' debut process, which involved releasing music and music videos without prior announcement or promotion, sets them apart from other K-pop groups.

concepts.name: R&B-infused Sound
concepts.description: NewJeans' unique blend of genres, including R&B, pop, and hip-hop, contributes to their distinctive sound.

concepts.name: Interactive Music Videos
concepts.description: The 'choose-your-own-adventure' style music video for 'Hype Boy' showcases the group's innovative approach to music video production.
